description: A mix between Portal, Zelda and Metroid. Exploration, puzzles, terrible combat, secret upgrades and new abilities that help you reach new places.

This is the initial release of the alpha.
Please install according to the standard instructions. 

Find further instructions at  https://github.com/DrNjitram/SuprAP or github.

More details later

V0.0.2.title: V0.0.2

V0.1.0.description:
Completion now works
Fixed Rotation of Items
A saving system allowing for automatic reconnection of a slot
Added indication of filler and progression items

NOTE:
Restart the game if you want to go to main menu (game will crash anyhow)
Sometimes the game might freeze ~10 seconds after connection

Known Issues:
A bunch
Barrels overlap when spawning their items
Green Moons are given still from vanilla locations
Sometimes, too much gun damage is sent.
Controllers are not supported due to a lack of key capture support
Blueville might be fucky, try to do this vanilla
V0.1.0.title: V0.1.0
